title: George Carlin-It's Bad for Ya 2008_HBO_PDTV_XviD~Ekolb
description:
It's Bad for Ya

Carlin's Emmy nominated 14th and final HBO special from March 2008. It's Bad For Ya features Carlin's noted irreverent and unapologetic observations on topics ranging from death, religion, patriotism and big business to the pungent examinations of modern language and the "decrepit state of the American culture."

Carlin said of It's Bad For Ya, "Doing new stuff is a point of pride with me. I can't do old material; I would feel like a failure. People may not consider it so, but stand-up comedy is one of the performing arts, and artists are supposed to grow and evolve over time. Through the years, my technique has sharpened, my writing has improved and even my observations have grown richer."
